item.title: 三色公司为即将拍卖的车辆支付了 1.25 亿美元
item.description: 破产的次级汽车贷款公司 Tricolor Holdings 赢得了法院许可，可以对该公司在今年早些时候倒闭前以 1.25 亿美元收购的约 9500 辆汽车进行拍卖。【原文：Bankrupt subprime auto lender Tricolor Holdings won court permission to hold an auction for about 9,500 vehicles that it acquired for $125 million before the company collapsed earlier this year.】

item.title: 秘鲁航空公司因新转机费而取消国际航线
item.description: 由于新的转机费，从秘鲁最大机场起飞的航空公司正在取消国际航线，这进一步损害了首都利马最近完工的航站楼的顺利投产。【原文：Airlines operating out of Peru’s largest airport are canceling international routes because of a new transfer fee, further tarnishing the botched rollout of a recently completed terminal in the capital, Lima.】

item.title: 海外投资者购买 60 亿美元哥伦比亚比索债券，创历史新高
item.description: 周五，一家海外基金通过与政府直接谈判，购买了约 60 亿美元的哥伦比亚地方债券。【原文：An offshore fund is buying about $6 billion of Colombian local bonds on Friday through a direct negotiation with the government.】

item.title: 暴雪总裁谈文化、奖金和发布更多游戏
item.description: 约翰娜-法尔斯（Johanna Faries）于 2024 年接任暴雪总裁一职，她透露了这家历史悠久的工作室的未来发展。【原文：Johanna Faries, who took over as president of Blizzard in 2024, reveals what’s coming from the storied studio】

item.title: 伯恩斯坦称英伟达对芯片指数的折让处于历史水平
item.description: 伯恩斯坦认为，Nvidia Corp. 相对于费城证券交易所半导体指数的估值很少如此具有吸引力，而这一倍数总体上预示着未来回报的良好前景。【原文：Nvidia Corp.’s valuation relative to the Philadelphia Stock Exchange Semiconductor Index has rarely been so attractive, and the multiple overall augurs well for future returns, according to Bernstein.】

item.title: 私人信用评级面临全球监管机构的新一轮审查
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士告诉彭博新闻社，私人信贷行业正面临着全球最高监管机构对这一价值 1.7 万亿美元的市场上的一些债务评级所进行的新一轮审查。【原文：The private credit industry is facing fresh scrutiny from top global regulators over some of the ratings being assigned to debt in the $1.7 trillion market, people familiar with the matter told Bloomberg News.】

item.title: 卡特彼勒四月以来最糟糕的五天显示出人工智能炒作的陷阱
item.description: 卡特彼勒公司（Caterpillar Inc.【原文：Caterpillar Inc.’s AI-powered rally stumbled as investors questioned the sustainability of the trade across US equities, sending the stock tumbling from a record high in its worst five-day stretch since April.】

item.title: 欧盟各国政府就数字欧元达成一致，迈出项目关键一步
item.description: 欧盟各国政府就数字欧元的共同立场达成了一致，这标志着该项目迎来了一个重要的里程碑，在美国兜售以美元计价的稳定币之际，该项目被视为对欧盟货币主权和联合货币的全球作用至关重要。【原文：European Union governments agreed on a common position on the digital euro, marking an important milestone for the project that’s seen as crucial for the bloc’s monetary sovereignty and the joint currency’s global role as the US touts dollar-denominated stablecoins.】

item.title: Pimco 和 Witkoff 事务所拖欠 4 亿美元的洛杉矶公寓大楼工程款
item.description: 根据向洛杉矶县提交的一份通知，太平洋投资管理公司（Pacific Investment Management Co.【原文：Pacific Investment Management Co. and Witkoff Group, the real estate developer founded by US special envoy Steve Witkoff, are in default on a $400 million-plus loan tied to a luxury apartment complex in Santa Monica, California, according to a notice filed with Los Angeles County.】

item.title: 全球市场供应过剩，小麦将迎来 6 月以来最差一周
item.description: 小麦的单周跌幅接近 4%，为 6 月份以来的最大跌幅，原因是全球谷物供应充足，使市场在进入假期前出现看跌倾向。【原文：Wheat is closing in on a weekly drop of about 4% — the biggest since June — as ample world grain supplies gave the market a bearish tilt heading into the holidays.】

item.title: 特朗普假期行动后财政部维持美债销售时间不变
item.description: 美国财政部周五宣布，将按原定计划在 12 月份出售国库券和息票。【原文：The US Treasury Department on Friday announced it would proceed with its sales of Treasury bills and coupons in December as previously scheduled.】

item.title: TikTok 所有者字节跳动公司有望在 2025 年实现 500 亿美元利润
item.description: 字节跳动有限公司（ByteDance Ltd.）有望在 2025 年实现约 500 亿美元的利润，为这家正在大力进军电子商务和新市场的中国社交媒体领军企业创纪录的一年画上圆满句号。【原文：ByteDance Ltd. is on track for profits of roughly $50 billion in 2025, capping a record year for a Chinese social media leader making major inroads into e-commerce and new markets.】

item.title: 美国现房销售因房价上涨而走高
item.description: 美国 11 月份的成屋销售量几乎没有增长，原因是近期价格增长和抵押贷款利率的放缓在一定程度上刺激了购房者。【原文：Existing-home sales in the US barely rose in November, as a recent moderation in price growth and mortgage rates motivated buyers at the margin.】

item.title: 美国消费者信心指数回升，预算担忧挥之不去
item.description: 美国消费者信心指数在 12 月份的增幅低于预期，在对经济承受能力的担忧挥之不去的情况下，消费者信心指数依然低迷。【原文：US consumer sentiment rose in December by less than expected, remaining depressed amid lingering affordability concerns.】

item.title: 在大量期权到期之际，科技股和甲骨文引领 S&P 500 指数走高
item.description: 周五上午，美国股市攀升，原因是交易员正努力应对创纪录的期权到期日，并对甲骨文公司等科技公司的涨势进行评估。【原文：US stocks climbed Friday morning as traders grappled with a record options expiration and assessed gains by tech firms including Oracle Corp., which is leading a group to buy TikTok.】

item.title: 皮博迪首席执行官格雷奇将于 2028 年从煤矿巨头卸任
item.description: 吉姆-格雷奇（Jim Grech）计划于 2028 年中期卸任美国最大煤矿企业皮博迪能源公司（Peabody Energy Corp.【原文：Jim Grech is planning to step down from his role as head of Peabody Energy Corp., the biggest US coal miner, in mid-2028.】

item.title: 加密货币乱象令对冲基金陷入自 2022 年大崩盘以来最糟糕的一年
item.description: 在边缘徘徊多年后，加密货币对冲基金进入 2025 年，希望能有所突破。【原文：After years on the fringes, crypto hedge funds entered 2025 hoping for a breakout.】

item.title: QQQ 投票通过后，Invesco 获得 1.8 亿美元意外之财
item.description: Invesco Ltd. 旗下著名科技基金 QQQ 的所有者投票决定将该产品转为开放式结构，此举可为该资产管理公司带来数亿美元的年收入。【原文：Owners of Invesco Ltd.’s famed tech fund QQQ voted to convert the product into an open-ended structure, a move that could unlock hundreds of millions in annual revenue for the asset manager.】

item.title: 必和必拓将盎格鲁置于 "后视镜 "中，首席执行官关注加拿大铜业
item.description: 必和必拓集团（BHP Group Ltd.）的顶头上司表示，在公司收购英美资源集团（Anglo American Plc）的尝试失败后，他将继续前进，转而专注于铜矿项目和加拿大的机遇。【原文：BHP Group Ltd.’s top boss said he’s moving on after the company’s aborted attempt to buy Anglo American Plc, preferring instead to focus on its copper projects and opportunities in Canada.】

item.title: 欧盟债券面临乌克兰额外借款建议的考验
item.description: 随着布鲁塞尔官员寻求增加借贷以向乌克兰提供资金，欧盟联合债务的投资者面临着未来几年供应量增加的风险。【原文：Investors in the European Union’s joint debt face the risk of greater supply in coming years as officials in Brussels seek to increase borrowing to provide funding to Ukraine.】

item.title: 美联储主席威廉姆斯表示不急于进一步调整利率
item.description: 纽约联邦储备银行行长约翰-威廉姆斯（John Williams）表示，没有进一步调整利率的紧迫性，近期的就业和通胀数据也几乎没有改变他的前景。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of New York President John Williams said there’s no urgency to further adjust interest rates and recent employment and inflation data did little to change his outlook.】

item.title: 接受英国央行调查的投资者认为利率维持在 3% 或以下的可能性各占一半
item.description: 据英国央行进行的一项调查显示，投资者认为英国央行可能需要进一步降息，因为有迹象表明英国经济和劳动力市场正在失去动力。【原文：Investors believe the Bank of England may need to cut interest rates much further amid signs the UK economy and labor market are losing momentum, according to a survey carried out by the central bank.】

item.title: 损失 10 亿欧元的养老基金抨击私人市场评级
item.description: 德国一家养老基金因涉足私募市场而导致了超过 10 亿欧元的损失，该基金对其所使用的评级的完整性提出了质疑，这加剧了人们对这一蓬勃发展的资产类别的估值风险的警告。【原文：A German pension fund whose foray into private markets led to more than €1 billion in losses has questioned the integrity of the ratings it used, adding to growing warnings over valuation risks across the booming asset class.】

item.title: 加拿大第四季度零售销售将出现反弹
item.description: 加拿大 11 月份的零售销售额在上个月略有下降之后出现了大幅增长，这表明第四季度的消费出现了温和反弹。【原文：Canadian retail sales surged in November after posting a small decline the previous month, suggesting consumption rebounded modestly in the fourth quarter.】

item.title: Point72 为其 Star Trader 的发布下了有史以来最大的赌注
item.description: Point72 资产管理公司（Point72 Asset Management）的一位明星交易员即将离职，创办自己的对冲基金，并获得了该公司有史以来给予离职交易员的最大一笔初始资金支持。【原文：One of Point72 Asset Management’s star traders is leaving to launch his own hedge fund and has secured the largest initial backing the firm has ever granted to a departing trader.】

item.title: DraftKings 通过新交易应用程序进入预测市场热潮
item.description: DraftKings Inc. 将于周五发布一款新的应用程序，允许美国 38 个州的客户通过预测市场进行体育和金融活动的合约交易。【原文：DraftKings Inc. is releasing a new app on Friday that will allow customers in 38 states to trade contracts on sports and financial events through prediction markets.】

item.title: 数据中心停运 10 小时考验 KKR、GIP 的雄心壮志
item.description: 数据中心运营商对 "五个九 "的要求非常执着，希望他们能保证金融市场、电子商务和人工智能背后的基础设施在 99.999% 的时间内正常运行。【原文：Data center operators are fixated on the “five nines” — an expectation that they’ll keep the infrastructure behind financial markets, e-commerce and artificial intelligence running 99.999% of the time.】

item.title: 稳定币热潮助推全天候无国界美元银行业务
item.description: 三年前，穆斯塔法-伊斯梅尔在肯尼亚创办了 Karcsham Co.公司，为非洲和拉丁美洲十几个国家的数千名客户转售星联设备并管理订阅服务。起初，他用当地的银行卡支付每月账单。但是，5% 的外汇兑换费很快就蚕食了他的利润。【原文：Three years ago Mustafa Ismael launched Karcsham Co., a Kenya-based company that resells Starlink devices and manages subscriptions for thousands of customers across a dozen African and Latin American countries. At first he used his local bank card to pay the monthly bills. But the 5% foreign exchange fees soon began eating into his profits.】

item.title: 联合健康在外部顾问审查中发现合规漏洞
item.description: 联合健康集团公司（UnitedHealth Group Inc.【原文：UnitedHealth Group Inc. released the first outside reviews of its business practices — reports it commissioned that describe its policies as “robust” while pointing to ongoing problems in areas that have faced scrutiny.】

item.title: 欧洲受伤行业努力抓住经济尾风
item.description: 碳政策的调整和天然气价格的下降并不能解决该地区的竞争力问题。【原文：Carbon-policy tweaks and lower gas prices can’t solve the region’s competitiveness problem.】
